ThingDef.label: cryptic genome
ThingDef.description:
A payload of non-standard genetic material. Can be used at the genomorpher to create a growth cell of a hybrid animal. This tier 1 genome can be used as either a primary or secondary genome.

<color=#E5E54C>Gameplay effect:</color> cryptic genomes use non-standard genetic chemistry which risks higher chances of failure. 

<color=#E5E54C>Extraction:</color> Can be extracted via the genome extractor table or any genome excavator from:

ThingDef.label: derived cryptic genome
ThingDef.description:
A payload of non-standard genetic material. This genome has been stabilized through synthethis with other life forms. Can be used at the genomorpher to create a growth cell of a hybrid animal. This tier 2 genome can be used as either a primary or secondary genome.

<color=#E5E54C>Gameplay effect:</color> cryptic genomes use non-standard genetic chemistry which risks higher chances of failure. 

<color=#E5E54C>Extraction:</color> Can be extracted via the genome extractor table or any genome excavator from:

ThingDef.label: purified cryptic genome
ThingDef.description:
A non-newtonian fluid which exhibits genome like information density. Stabilized in a proper housing it can be used at the genomorpher to create a growth cell of a hybrid animal. This tier 3 genome can be used as either a primary or secondary genome.

<color=#E5E54C>Gameplay effect:</color> cryptic genomes use non-standard genetic chemistry which risks higher chances of failure. 

<color=#E5E54C>Extraction:</color> Can be extracted via the genome extractor table or any genome excavator from:
